testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I should be able to access the relevant announcement data by entering id through the API connection.
testcase.name: Invalid Token When sending a GET body with invalid authorization information to the /api/getNoticeById
testcase.system-out: Given The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.................passed When The api user prepares a GET request containing the 341 information to send to the api getNoticeById endpoint..passed Then The api user sends a GET body, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden..passed

testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin), I want to be able to create a new announcement record via API connection.
testcase.name: The creation of the new announcement record to be created through the API must be verified through the API.
testcase.system-out: Given The api user sets "api/getNoticeById" path parameters.................passed When The api user prepares a GET request containing the 393 information to send to the api getNoticeById endpoint..passed Then The api user sends a GET body and saves the returned response..........passed Then The api user verifies that the status code is 200......................passed And The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..passed
